channel.title: Simplicity Clean Delta [317]
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][color=blue][font=georgia]Simplicity
[center]Literally No credit is towards me, all I did was combine and pack and upload two very clean delta parts, source, and client.
The source is from Neroxx, the Oprah source.
The client is Murloth's delta client, with some bug fixes and a little more cleaning.
No pictures because you can just go to Oprah,
Client is standard, plays original music, jagex on top, pretty much classic delta.
click [url=http://up.ht/GYRjw9]here[/url] for the download of Simplicity. <-Package, Client & Source
All credits to Oprah and Murloth [/center]

item.title: Simplicity Clean Delta [317]
item.dc:creator: @Carter2 Carter_
item.description:
@Carter2 wrote:

It is if the original is down (oh look, alliteration).

Read full topic

item.title: Simplicity Clean Delta [317]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“DubbinStep, post:5, topic:437755”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=540456.msg3958244#msg3958244 date=1332985044]

What did you do exactly?

can you read? I did nothing except put the two together, gave both the creators credit and gave myself none of it. I just paired to clean things and made one clean delta,

Why was this needed to be released? There are quite a few 'Cleaned Delta’s out there.
[/quote]

Another Option, please think before posting. That’s why we have computers, to not act dumb.[/quote]
He’s not acting “dumb”, it’s not really considered another option if it’s the same base re-posted mate.

Read full topic

It helped me. Muroth’s client download was down.

can you read? I did nothing except put the two together, gave both the creators credit and gave myself none of it. I just paired to clean things and made one clean delta,

Why was this needed to be released? There are quite a few 'Cleaned Delta’s out there.
[/quote]

Another Option, please think before posting. That’s why we have computers, to not act dumb.[/quote]
I have a computer to play games and to make money, not to make me smarter…

Also, he’s right. We have millions of these and it’s not needed in the slightest.
